name: Cassiopeia (ibroketheworld)
description:
Cassiopeia is a walking-simulator and visual novel with a unique cyberpunk watercolor-style.

It was developed by a team of 3 Students during the summer-semester 2019 at the Bauhaus-Uni Weimar. The idea was to develop a game prototype to improve our game-development- and artistic skills.

It's story doesn't represent a full  concept, but more a prologue to a bigger, unconcluded story.

Credits:

Clara Bernhard - Direction, Writing and Artwork

Susann Beyer - Music and Sounddesign

Valentin Birner - Coding, additional Assets
